main event: A witness observed a bright and glowing object approximately 12 to 15 feet in diameter moving slowly and silently from northeast to northwest in Tempe, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was visible for 3-5 minutes before it burned out and disappeared., The object moved without making any sound., The witness described the weather conditions as clear with unlimited visibility., The object had a round shape and was bright orange in color., The investigating officer concluded it was likely a hot air balloon due to similar reports in the area.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], age 23, unemployed, with 2 1/2 years of college education
